lead_paragraph: MASSCHUSETTS TEMPERANCE CONVENTION.--A State Temperance Convention was held at Worcester, Mass., on Wednesday last, at which the Hon. N. P. BANKS presided. Resolutions were adopted approving of the principle of the late law of Maine for prohibiting the sale of intoxicating drinks.
